text: midneunjadeul-iyeo yeeonjaui gajeong-eul deul-eogadoe ittaeneun sigsaleul wihae neohuiege heoyongdoeeoss-eul ttaeimyeo sigsa ga wanlyodoegileul gidalyeoseoneun ani doenola geuleona neohuiga chodae doeeoss eul ttaeneun deul-eogala geuligo sigsaleul machimyeon jaliyeseo il-eoseol geos-imyeo seologa iyagileul deul-eulyeo hajimalla sillo igeos-eun seonjijaleul goelobhineun il-ila yeeonjaneun neohuileul bonaem-e sujub-eo hasa hananim-eun jinlileul mal hasim-e jujeohaji ani hasim-ila geuligo neohuineun seonjijaui bu-in-eulo buteo mueos-eul yoguhal ttae galimsaeleul saie dugo hala geuleohge ham-i neo hui ma-eumgwa seonjija bu-indeul-ui ma-eum eul wihae sungyeolhan geos-ila neohuineun ha nanim-ui seonjijaleul goelobhiji aniha dolog cheosinhala neohuineun i bu-indeul gwa gyeolhonhal su eobsnola igeos-eun sillo hananim ap-e keun joeag-ila
